formatted_address: 91 Joo Koon Cir, #02-01 Joo Koon MRT Station, Singapore 629116
name: Haveen Minimart Pte Ltd

reviews.text:
Haveen Minimart is a place to buy normal stuffs. But it seems every evening around 7 - 8 pm, the lady has several friends to entertain that she does not care about the buyers. Indian lady who is quite tanned and short. She always says there's no more Winston Classic and the customer has to guide her with the directions.
Really rude as well, and can argue. Had to remind her that this is Singapore and customer service is important. Not the first time though.
ALL ITEMS TOO EXPENSIVE AND WORKERS MANY PEOPLE WORKING JOO KOON.. DON'T BUY ANY ITEMS..

vicinity: 91 Joo Koon Circle, #02-01 Joo Koon MRT Station, Singapore
